resources.string: Change your app theme, dynamic color, language…
Apply the colors following your wallpaper.
Help to translate the app to your language in Hosted Weblate
A Spotify-like mod with unlimited skips, play on-demand, ad-free and newer features. This replaces original Spotify app (the one that you download from Play Store).

A Spotify-like mod with unlimited skips, play on-demand, ad-free and newer features but cloned. This means a separated package/app from original, so you can have original Spotify and mod at the same time.
"Same features as regular mod but this one has AMOLED theme. "
Same features as Amoled mod but it\'s cloned.
There are two principal types of processor architecture in the majority of devices, 32 and 64 bit.
Spotify provides both types of architectures to us, but you need to know which one to choose.
The mobile architectures are the next :
This type of architecture is based on 64 bit. It can run any Spotify package (32 bit ones are emulated)
This type of architecture is based on 32 bit. It can JUST run ARMEABI packages.
To check your processor architecture, scroll down till the end of the main page.
